languages.text: {n}Ни одна рана не пятнает ее белую кожу, но нет сомнений, что женщина вскоре умрет. Ее аугменты отказывают, словно подверглись какому-то энтропическому влиянию. На мгновение вам кажется, что вы видите признаки техночумы — но нет, здесь вы столкнулись не с распадом, а преобразованием материи, из которой составлена Истинная плоть техножрицы.{/n}

{n}There is not a single wound upon her white skin, but there is no doubt that she will soon perish. Her augmetics are failing as if they have been sabotaged by some entropic influence. For a moment you consider it a sign of tech-blight, but then you refute the thought — what you are witnessing is not decay, but transformation of the matter from which the Tech-Priest's True Flesh is made.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ни одна рана не пятнает ее белую кожу, но нет сомнений, что женщина вскоре умрет. Ее аугменты отказывают, словно подверглись какому-то энтропическому влиянию. На мгновение вам кажется, что вы видите признаки техночумы — но нет, здесь вы столкнулись не с распадом, а преобразованием материи, из которой составлена Истинная плоть техножрицы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}There is not a single wound upon her white skin, but there is no doubt that she will soon perish. Her augmetics are failing as if they were sabotaged by some entropic influence. For a moment you consider it a sign of the tech-blight, but then you refute the thought — what you are witnessing is not decay, but transformation of the matter from which the Tech-Priest's True Flesh is made.{/n}

For a moment you consider it a sign of tech-blight, but then you refute the thought — what you are witnessing is not decay, but transformation of the matter from which the Tech-Priest's True Flesh is made.{/n}

{n}There is not a single wound upon her white skin, but there is no doubt that she will soon perish. Her augmetics are failing as if they have been sabotaged by some entropic influence. For a moment you consider it a sign of tech-blight, but then you refute the thought — what you are witnessing is not decay, but transformation of the matter from which the Tech-Priest's True Flesh is made.{/n}

languages.text: {n}她洁白的皮肤上没有一丝伤痕，但毫无疑问，她很快就会死亡。她身上植入物的力量正在衰退，仿佛受到了某种熵的影响。有那么一瞬间，你以为这是技术枯萎症的征兆，但随后你又否定了这个想法，因为你所看到的并不是腐化的情形，而是技术神甫实肉物质的转化过程。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is not a single wound upon her white skin, but there is no doubt that she will soon perish. Her augmetics are failing as if they have been sabotaged by some entropic influence. For a moment you consider it a sign of tech-blight, but then you refute the thought — what you are witnessing is not decay, but transformation of the matter from which the Tech-Priest's True Flesh is made.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她洁白的皮肤上没有一丝伤痕，但毫无疑问，她很快就会死亡。她身上植入物的力量正在衰退，仿佛受到了某种熵的影响。有那么一瞬间，你以为这是技术枯萎症的征兆，但随后你又否定了这个想法，因为你所看到的并不是腐化的情形，而是技术祭司实肉物质的转化过程。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bien que sa peau blanche ne présente pas la moindre blessure, il est évident que sa mort est proche. Ses augmétiques ne fonctionnent plus, comme s'ils avaient été sabotés par une influence entropique. Vous pensez brièvement qu'il s'agit de la technopeste, mais vous repoussez bien vite cette idée. Ce que vous observez n'est pas une dégradation, mais une transformation de la matière formant la chair véritable de la technoprêtresse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is not a single wound upon her white skin, but there is no doubt that she will soon perish. Her augmetics are failing as if they have been sabotaged by some entropic influence. For a moment you consider it a sign of tech-blight, but then you refute the thought — what you are witnessing is not decay, but transformation of the matter from which the Tech-Priest's True Flesh is made.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien que sa peau blanche ne présente pas la moindre blessure, il est évident que sa mort est proche. Ses augmétiques ne fonctionnent plus, comme s'ils avaient été sabotés par une influence entropique. Vous pensez brièvement qu'il s'agit de la technopeste, mais vous repoussez bien vite cette idée. Ce que vous observez n'est pas une dégradation, mais une transformation de la matière formant la chair véritable de la technoprêtresse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼女の白い肌には傷ひとつないが、間もなく死ぬことは間違いない。まるで崩壊の影響によって妨害されたかのように、彼女のオーグメティックは機能していない。一瞬、技術疾病の兆候かと思ったが、すぐにその考えを捨てた――目撃しているのは劣化ではなく、技術司祭の真の肉体の真なる肉を形成している物質の変化だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is not a single wound upon her white skin, but there is no doubt that she will soon perish. Her augmetics are failing as if they have been sabotaged by some entropic influence. For a moment you consider it a sign of tech-blight, but then you refute the thought — what you are witnessing is not decay, but transformation of the matter from which the Tech-Priest's True Flesh is made.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の白い肌には傷ひとつないが、間もなく死ぬことは間違いない。まるで崩壊の影響によって妨害されたかのように、彼女のオーグメティックは機能していない。一瞬、技術疾病の兆候かと思ったが、すぐにその考えを捨てた――目撃しているのは劣化ではなく、技術司祭の真の肉体の真なる肉を形成している物質の変化だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Su tez blanca no presenta ni una sola herida, pero no cabe duda de que pronto le llegará la muerte. Los auméticos le fallan como si los estuviera manipulando una entidad entrópica. Por un instante lo consideras un indicio de tecnoplaga, pero enseguida rebates dicho pensamiento: lo que tienes ante ti no es deterioro, sino transformación de la materia con la que está hecha la verdadera carne de la tecnosacerdotisa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is not a single wound upon her white skin, but there is no doubt that she will soon perish. Her augmetics are failing as if they have been sabotaged by some entropic influence. For a moment you consider it a sign of tech-blight, but then you refute the thought — what you are witnessing is not decay, but transformation of the matter from which the Tech-Priest's True Flesh is made.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Su tez blanca no presenta ni una sola herida, pero no cabe duda de que pronto le llegará la muerte. Los auméticos le fallan como si los estuviera manipulando una entidad entrópica. Por un instante lo consideras un indicio de tecnoplaga, pero enseguida rebates dicho pensamiento: lo que tienes ante ti no es deterioro, sino transformación de la materia con la que está hecha la verdadera carne de la tecnosacerdotisa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Auf ihrer weißen Haut ist keine einzige Wunde zu sehen, doch es besteht kein Zweifel, dass sie bald sterben wird. Ihre Augmentationen versagen, als wären sie von einem entropischen Einfluss sabotiert worden. Einen Augenblick langt überlegst du, ob das ein Zeichen der Tech-Seuche sein könnte, doch dann verwirfst du den Gedanken. Was du hier erlebst, ist kein Verfall, sondern eine Verwandlung der Materie, aus der das Wahre Fleisch der Techpriesterin besteht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is not a single wound upon her white skin, but there is no doubt that she will soon perish. Her augmetics are failing as if they have been sabotaged by some entropic influence. For a moment you consider it a sign of tech-blight, but then you refute the thought — what you are witnessing is not decay, but transformation of the matter from which the Tech-Priest's True Flesh is made.{/n}

Was du hier erlebst, ist kein Verfall, sondern eine Verwandlung der Materie, aus der das Wahre Fleisch der Techpriesterin besteht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ak derisinde tek bir yara bile görünmüyor ancak yakında son nefesini vereceğine en ufak bir şüphe yok. Ogmetikleri, entropik bir etkinin altındaymışçasına arızalanıyor. Bir anlığına tekno afetinin semptomları olabileceğini düşünüyor ancak bu düşünceyi çabucak silkeliyorsun. Çürümeye değil, Tekno Rahibin Salt Suret'ini oluşturan maddenin dönüşümüne tanık oluyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is not a single wound upon her white skin, but there is no doubt that she will soon perish. Her augmetics are failing as if they have been sabotaged by some entropic influence. For a moment you consider it a sign of tech-blight, but then you refute the thought — what you are witnessing is not decay, but transformation of the matter from which the Tech-Priest's True Flesh is made.{/n}
